Helper for Theorem 19.7: the Euclidean-coordinate transport of the recession cone term equals the ambient-space recession cone.

Helper for Corollary 19.7.1: a polyhedral convex set is finitely generated.

lemma helperForCorollary_19_7_1_finitelyGenerated_of_polyhedral {n : } {C : Set (Fin n )} (hCpoly : IsPolyhedralConvexSet n C) : IsFinitelyGeneratedConvexSet n C := by have hCconv : Convex C := helperForTheorem_19_1_polyhedral_isConvex (n := n) (C := C) hCpoly have hTFAE : [IsPolyhedralConvexSet n C, (IsClosed C {C' : Set (Fin n ) | IsFace ( := ) C C'}.Finite), IsFinitelyGeneratedConvexSet n C].TFAE := polyhedral_closed_finiteFaces_finitelyGenerated_equiv (n := n) (C := C) hCconv exact (hTFAE.out 0 2).1 hCpoly

Corollary 19.7.1: If Unknown identifier `C`C is a polyhedral convex set containing the origin, the convex cone generated by Unknown identifier `C`C is polyhedral.

theorem polyhedral_convexConeGenerated_of_origin_mem (n : ) (C : Set (Fin n )) : IsPolyhedralConvexSet n C (0 : Fin n ) C IsPolyhedralConvexSet n (convexConeGenerated n C) := by intro hCpoly hC0 have hCfg : IsFinitelyGeneratedConvexSet n C := helperForCorollary_19_7_1_finitelyGenerated_of_polyhedral (n := n) (C := C) hCpoly rcases hCfg with S, S, hSfin, hSfin, hCeq have hK_eq_cone : convexConeGenerated n C = cone n (S S) := helperForTheorem_19_7_originMem_convexConeGenerated_eq_finiteCone (n := n) (C := C) (S := S) (S := S) hCeq hSfin hSfin hC0 have hcone_poly : IsPolyhedralConvexSet n (cone n (S S)) := helperForTheorem_19_1_cone_polyhedral_of_finite_generators (m := n) (T := S S) (hSfin.union hSfin) simpa [hK_eq_cone] using hcone_poly
